#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
int check(int n,int b)
{
	if(n<2)
	{
		return(1);
	}
	int count=0;
	while(b*b<=n)
	{
		if(n%b==0)
		{
//		cout<<b<<" ";	
		count+=check(n/b,b);
		}
		b++;		
	}
	return(count+1);
}
int main()
{
	int n,t,count;
		cin>>n;
	while(n)
	{
		count=0;
		
		count=check(n,2);
		cout<<count-1<<endl;
		cin>>n;
	}
	return(0);
}
